channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Chinese Brokerages to Merge, Creating a $228 Billion Entity

item.title: Want to watch every NFL game this season? It’s going to cost you nearly $2,500.
item.description: Watching all NFL games this season will require a big financial commitment, seven streaming services and six username-and-password combinations

item.title: One Bargain You Can't Find at Costco Is Its Stock---Does That Matter?
item.description: Charlie Munger’s ‘perfect damn’ retailer is as high quality as it gets, but history points to disappointment even for great companies.

item.title: Don’t bash Buffett. His Berkshire Hathaway has ‘pummeled’ the S&P 500, says this fund manager
item.description: The Omaha-based conglomerate hit a record high this week and is way cheaper than Apple and Microsoft

item.title: What Lies Behind the Markets' Jitters

item.title: Can bitcoin beat its historic September slump? Why this year could be different.
item.description: September has historically been the worst-performing month for both bitcoin and stocks.

item.title: Jobs report holds key to size of Fed rate cut. Forecast: 161,000 new hires, 4.2% unemployment
item.description: The U.S. jobs report is always a big deal on Wall Street, but the August payroll numbers loom even larger. They could sway how much the Federal Reserv...

item.title: U.S. Crude Oil Stockpiles Fall More Than Expected
item.description: U.S. crude oil inventories fell more than expected last week amid a decline in imports, while production and refinery capacity use held steady, accord...

item.title: ‘I never thought they would be in this situation’: Our daughter and son-in-law spend money as fast as his parents give it to them. Should we intervene?
item.description: “She had two rounds of IVF before she had a successful pregnancy. It cost $90,000, which has wiped out most of their savings.”
